title: Paul Clement adds former Chelsea star Claude Makelele to his Swansea coaching staff
text:
Paul Clement adds former Chelsea star Claude Makelele to his Swansea coaching staff Clement has overhauled his backroom team at the Liberty Stadium, with Frenchman Makelele arriving as assistant Share Claude Makelele is back in the Premier League (Photo: Getty) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Former Chelsea star Claude Makelele has joined Swanseaâ€™s coaching staff. 
Swans boss Paul Clement has overhauled his backroom team at the Liberty Stadium. 
Alan Curtis was dismissed from his first-team role, with Makelele arriving as assistant. 
The Frenchman will work alongside fellow new recruits Nigel Gibbs and Karl Halabi, as well as goalkeeping coach Tony Roberts. 
Makelele spent five years in the Premier League with Chelsea between 2003-2008, featuring more than 200 times for the Blues. Paul Clement will be joined in the dugout by Makelele (Photo: Getty Images) 
The 43-year-old worked with Clement during his time at Stamford Bridge and as a coach at Paris Saint Germanin.
